Can be [ff2bede6]Dual-Wielded[/ff2bede6] to access the 3rd and 4th Skill or can be [ff2bede6]used[/ff2bede6] with a one handed [ff2bede6]Melee or Psyker Weapon[/ff2bede6] or a [ff2bede6]Shield[/ff2bede6].

Journal.eng: A decent weapon for most single target engagements, even though it lacks the punch to knock down armored enemies, it still has some CC capabilities.

desc.eng: Can be [ff2bede6]Dual-Wielded[/ff2bede6] to access the 3rd and 4th Skill or can be [ff2bede6]used[/ff2bede6] with a one handed [ff2bede6]Melee or Psyker Weapon[/ff2bede6] or a [ff2bede6]Shield[/ff2bede6].

Journal.eng: The big brother of Autopistol, can even be useful against armored. Though it's still limited by its size, dual wielding it can compensate any weakness it might have.

desc.eng: Can be [ff2bede6]Dual-Wielded[/ff2bede6] to access the 3rd and 4th Skill or can be [ff2bede6]used[/ff2bede6] with a one handed [ff2bede6]Melee or Psyker Weapon[/ff2bede6] or a [ff2bede6]Shield[/ff2bede6].

Journal.eng: An excellent weapon in basically all situations, its only weakness is its tendency to overheat, which can be very limiting in the worst moments.

desc.eng: Can be [ff2bede6]Dual-Wielded[/ff2bede6] to access the 3rd and 4th Skill or can be [ff2bede6]used[/ff2bede6] with a one handed [ff2bede6]Melee or Psyker Weapon[/ff2bede6] or a [ff2bede6]Shield[/ff2bede6].

Journal.eng: A well rounded basic weapon, it can be used against most targets though it sorely lacks armor piercing and CC capabilities.

desc.eng: Can be [ff2bede6]Dual-Wielded[/ff2bede6] to access the 3rd and 4th Skill or can be [ff2bede6]used[/ff2bede6] with a one handed [ff2bede6]Melee or Psyker Weapon[/ff2bede6] or a [ff2bede6]Shield[/ff2bede6].

Journal.eng: An anti-armor weapon that can rip even the toughest opponents to shreds. Augmented with good CC capabilities, its only weakness might be a big crowd of attackers.

desc.eng: Can be [ff2bede6]Dual-Wielded[/ff2bede6] to access the 3rd and 4th Skill or can be [ff2bede6]used[/ff2bede6] with a one handed [ff2bede6]Melee or Psyker Weapon[/ff2bede6] or a [ff2bede6]Shield[/ff2bede6].

Journal.eng: Though it lacks any kind of CC it makes up for it in sheer destructive power. It can kill basically anything with ease.
A generic melee weapon, that deals decent damage in most cases, with shields it can be really effective.
A versatile one handed weapon with decent damage against both armored and unarmored targets but it sorely lacks CC.
CC heavy one handed weapon, that deals a decent damage. Combine it with a Storm Shield for maximum effect.
A very effective weapon against unarmored enemies but struggles against armored enemies.
In addition of providing some extra defense it also adds some much needed mobility with more CC. Good addition to any one handed weapon.
In addition to providing some extra defense it also adds some extra damage with CC. Good accessory to any one handed weapon.
A balanced melee weapon, it is really useful for clearing out soft targets, though it can have problems when faceing heavily armored opponents.
A good balance between single and multitarget combat, with a speck of mobility. Can be used in almost every combination though it's not really effective against armor.
An anti-Psyker weapon that excels in controlling enemies with all kinds of negative effect. It has good damage potential against unarmored targets.
A basic gun that is good against unarmored crowds but can be extremely weak against armored enemies.
Close-range weapon with a massive amount of CC skills. Extremely potent against hordes of enemies, but not really useful against distant and/or armored enemies.
A good balance between single and multitarget combat, with a speck of mobility. Can be used in almost every combination though it's not really effective against armor.
An all-rounder medium gun that can be good in any situation.
An anti-armor weapon that can rip even the toughest opponenst to shreds. Augmented with good CC capabilities, its only weakness might be a big crowd of attackers.
A well rounded basic gun, it can be useful in most situations though it sorely lacks armor piercing and CC capabilities.
Medium range anti-armor gun that also excels at burning away the unwanted members of the enemy force.
An all-rounder sniper with a decent amount of CC, but it's somewhat lacking in terms of raw damage.
Possibly the best weapon for Damage over Time builds, it also deals good amount of area damage.
An exceptional single target weapon, only the mightiest foes can withstand more than one shot from this weapon. It only suffers when faced against hordes of enemies.
A very situational weapon it can excel in situations where the enemies line up, wiping out tons of them in one shot, but generally its performance can be very varying.
A combo attack based weapon, using it to utilize the combos even compensates its weakness against armor.

A versatile sword that let's its user build up various debuffs on the enemies before finishing them. Though it somewhat lacks direct up-front damage, it's excellent scaling makes up for it in a few seconds.
A good balance between single and multitarget combat, with a speck of mobility. Can be used in almost every combination though it's not really effective against armor.
An impressive, powerful weapon that can literally knock everything and everyone off their feet. It has mobility and a horrendous amount of CC but not the most potent damage dealer.
A powerful anti-infantry weapon, can wreak havoc among unarmored bodies, but suffers against armored opponents.
A powerful anti-infantry weapon, can wreak havoc among unarmored bodies, but suffers against armored opponents.
A reliable close combat weapon that can be excellent against crowds of enemies, as well as armored bosses, but it lacks mobility and CC abilities.
A jack-of-all-trades gun, depending on its user it can be good in any situation.
Suppress the hell out of the enemies with this weapon. It has massive area damage and even better (or worse, if you stand against it) suppression damage.
The absolute best weapon for suppressing and clearing out hordes of enemies. It has massive area and cover damage, if you want to literally level the playing field this is the weapon.
A versatile heavy weapon that can be excellent in every situation but watch out for overheating.
A massive anti-armor gun that breaks even the heavies machinery the enemy can deploy. Excellent armor piercing and area damage, but lacking in terms of mobility and CC.

desc.eng: Adds an extra Skill slot for the Psychic Powers instead of your belt equipments.
Adds an extra Summoning Skill slot.

Desc.eng: Received during the Skull Throne event.\nThis implant was specially issued to uncover information about a devious Archenemy plot, involving Skull Procurators. It needs to be equipped in order to do so.

desc.eng: Can be [ff2bede6]Dual-Wielded[/ff2bede6] to access the 3rd and 4th Skill or can be [ff2bede6]used[/ff2bede6] with a [ff2bede6]Melee Psyker Weapon[/ff2bede6] or a [ff2bede6]Pistol[/ff2bede6].

Journal.eng: A basic Psyker weapon that should not be overlooked. Its powerful ranged abilities can wreak quite a havoc among weaker enemies, if augmented with armor piercing Psychic Powers, it can excel in any situation.

desc.eng: Can be [ff2bede6]Dual-Wielded[/ff2bede6] to access the 3rd and 4th Skill or can be [ff2bede6]used[/ff2bede6] with a [ff2bede6]Melee Psyker Weapon[/ff2bede6] or a [ff2bede6]Pistol[/ff2bede6].

Journal.eng: Long range area clearing monster. With the decent combination of shorter ranged and/or armor piercing Psychic Powers its weaknesses can be compensated.

desc.eng: Can be [ff2bede6]Dual-Wielded[/ff2bede6] to access the 3rd and 4th Skill or can be [ff2bede6]used[/ff2bede6] with a [ff2bede6]Melee Psyker Weapon[/ff2bede6] or a [ff2bede6]Pistol[/ff2bede6].

Journal.eng: Excellent weapon for clearing huge groups of enemies, support its abilites with single target/armor piercing Psychic Powers to get an unbeatable combination of Skills.

desc.eng: Can be [ff2bede6]Dual-Wielded[/ff2bede6] to access the 3rd and 4th Skill or can be [ff2bede6]used[/ff2bede6] with a [ff2bede6]Psyker Weapon[/ff2bede6] or a [ff2bede6]Pistol[/ff2bede6].

Journal.eng: A weapon with a Skill that deals massive single target damage and a slot for a Psychic Power. Combine it with a Force Rod type weapon for maximum effect.

desc.eng: Can be [ff2bede6]Dual-Wielded[/ff2bede6] to access the 3rd and 4th Skill or can be [ff2bede6]used[/ff2bede6] with a [ff2bede6]Psyker Weapon[/ff2bede6] or a [ff2bede6]Pistol[/ff2bede6].

Journal.eng: A sword with a decent Shock Skill, and a slot for a Psychic Power. Combine it with a Force Rod type weapon for maximum effect.

desc.eng: [ff2bede6]One-Handed[/ff2bede6] weapon. Can be [ff2bede6]used[/ff2bede6] with a [ff2bede6]Psyker Weapon[/ff2bede6] or a [ff2bede6]Pistol[/ff2bede6].

Journal.eng: A blade with a great mobility Skill, and a slot for a Psychic Power. Combine it with a Force Rod type weapon for maximum effect.
Excellent choice against armored enemies and for playstyles that favor more Psychic Powers.
A long range area weapon with massive supression damage that also allows the selection of three Psychic Powers.
A ranged single target weapon with three slots for Psychic Powers. Add some area damage and mobility and it can be an excellent choice.
A basic radiation rifle. Not great, not terrible and it provides three summoning slots for Constructs which can be a powerful tool in the right hands.
An advanced radiation rifle, that trades one summoning slot for for the ability to deal more damage.
A basic plasma rifle. It's not much to look at, but it provides three summoning slots for Constructs which can be a powerful tool in the right hands.
An advanced plasma rifle, that trades one summoning slot for for the ability to support the summoned Constructs.
It can effectively fell armored enemies and it also provides a good deal of Construct summoning slots.
Trades one summoning slot for some area damage, better for more active builds that rely less on Constructs.
A shock based weapon that comes with three slots for summoning Constructs.
A more advanced shock based weapon that trades a summoning slot for more CC.
